overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "High Voltage" — Starring Lee Ryder, Rod Phillips, and Mark Hunter. A desert horserace…a secluded power transformer…a legendary trio…overloading action! "Winner Takes All" — Starring Bill Henson and Aaron Gage. Sunbathing superstuds…a poolside challenge…a hard-fought race…the prize - anything you want! "Water Sports" — Starring Scott O'Hara and Randy Page. A jogging preppie…a new gardener…a jogger's dare…a gardener's response…wet and wild relentless energy!
title: Winner Takes All
